channel.description: Recent content in Research on Christian Saal

item.title: Footbonaut
item.description: Introduction In professional soccer a constant development of innovative diagnostic systems can be observed. A result of this development is the Footbonaut, which can be used to quantify the speed and accuracy of short passing actions in soccer. Method In my thesis a Footbonaut testing procedure (FSPT Footbonaut Short Passing Test) is presented and analyzed if fulfilling the criteria for test quality. First a cross-sectional study is used in a pre-post test design to answer questions on item quality, group differences and the effects of repeated measurements on speed and accuracy.
